title: ONE MONTH FREE-1BRApartment Near Our Fitness Center Renting For July!
posting_body: ['RENT AT RIDGEWOOD ARCHES!', 'ONE MONTH FREE!!!', '(restrictions may apply)', 'Welcome to our community!', 'Spacious1 bedroom in Perfect Minneapolis location, Now renting for July 2022!', 'Great One Bedroom / One Bathroom home on the 3rd floor now renting for $1060.00 on a 13 month lease.', 'Ask about apartment #229-310.', 'Our 1 bedrooms offer:', '• Gas Stove for classic style cooking', '• Open concept living room & kitchen', '• Huge closets and extra storage available', '• Updated Kitchens with dishwasher, microwave included', '• A/C and ceiling fan', '• All utilities except electric included in rent', '• Reserved parking available', '• 24 - Hour Package Pick-up', '• On-site Professional Management team', 'Ridgewood Arches also features an exercise room (close to all our buildings) for staying fit all season long.', 'Also enjoy our outdoor heated pool to enjoy during the summer!', 'Pricing Subject To Change (Length of Lease, Move In Date, Availability)*', 'We are located within walking distance to all your favorite Uptown spots, Nicollet Avenue’s “Eat Street”, and Downtown Minneapolis.', 'With access to public transportation and bike trails, you can get around the city easily for work and play.', '*Bigos Management', 'Pricing and availability are both determined by requested move-in date, cannot be guaranteed due to on-site leasing activity, and are subject to change at any time.']
